body: Hi, everyone, Have anyone met same problem in using "window shade generator" component: When choosing shade type=1(which means roller shade or metal screen), the component says,"Solution exception:Object reference not set to an instance of an object.". Plus, choosing type 0 and 2 is OK. Only 1 does not work. I have checked the component with a very simple case as below, but it still does not work. Can anyone help me? [](http://api.ning.com:80/files/TkRyGB8XlNAvPw7jbZSEClxwyprk0-LXJeaLqROzXYuUiJMNoIzGA6T5gD7Q1ZMqpyg10-x8gaq4ziysltSADjoRL1maujRX/123.png) Yours,  Anxiao
topic: Problems with Honeybee_Energyplus window shade generator

replies.body:
Anxiao,

You were missing some inputs for the component to work. See attached.

You probably will like to add also a schedule and a materail for the blinds.

-A.

Abraham,

Thank you so much! I have tried your GH file, it really works! Some inputs are essential.

You did a great help for me ! Thank you! :)

Anxiao
